replies.msg:
During those days, people were flooded with earnest desire, restless passion and emotions! An ingredient to make impulsive decision !!

No one truly take a deep breath, analyze Poly location which was a perfect setup for engulfing from perspective of playing chess such as Go Chess or Xiang Chi.

Mr. Siu asked and begged on youtube the young people to hold off until District Election, which was just a few days away. He was disregarded and his pledge was ignored. I believe Mr. Siu did not gain the respect at those days by young protestors until more recently.

I also posted Bruce Lee's videos on what it really meant by "Be Water" many times. "Be water" is not a slogan but a deep attitude toward daily life. Prerequisite was "empty your mind" , which was easily ignored.

Poly was a sad day. Hundreds of years of smart and young people time will now be under the mercy of judges in addition to all the insult and possible abuse experienced. It could be better used to fulfill their dreams whatever they are !

As Winston Churchill said in the messy days of World War: " Keep calm and carry on!! " NOT "Carry on and Keep Calm" !! Keep calm FIRST!!!!!!
